Title: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF SEVEN THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE MAINTENANCE OF TWENTY GOVERNMENT STUDENTS AT THE COLLEGE OF VETERINARY SCIENCE OF THE UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES.(awÞhi(
Data:
[ Act No. 2302, December 12, 1913 ]
AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF SEVEN THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE MAINTENANCE OF TWENTY GOVERNMENT STUDENTS AT THE COLLEGE OF VETERINARY SCIENCE OF THE UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES.(awÞhi(
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Legislature, that:
Section 1. The sum of seven thousand pesos is hereby Appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise appropriated, for the maintenance of twenty scholarships now existing in the College of Veterinary Science of the University of the Philippines, in accordance with the provisions of section one of Act Numbered Two thousand and forty.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, December 12, 1913.
